Name: Siren Survivor
Flavor: Against all odds, you've survived. Why?
Ability 1: $Exhuast Discard a Condition token or @Discard instead to discard a Condition card
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust Discard a Condition token from another Titan or @Discard instead to discard a Condition card from another Titan
Ability 3: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust When you are about to gain a Condition card or token, roll a d10. On a 6+, ignore this gain

Name: Someone Waiting
Flavor: You can't quite put a finger on it, but there's a soft pull on your soul's strings each time you look to the north
Ability 1: $Exhaust Stand up. You can use this ability while knocked down
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust Another Titan may stand up
Ability 3: %Danger 4+% When you are about to suffer Knockdown, you may roll a d10. On a 6+, ignore this Knockdown

Name: A Dream You Hold
Flavor: You are not some castaway on life's tumultuous ocean. Come hell or high water, you will fulfill your dream
Ability 1: Titans adjacent to you have +1 Precision
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust Another Titan may move 1 space
Ability 3: %Danger 8+% $Fate $Exhaust When you attack, use another Titan's Kratos Table for this Attack

Name: Family Feud
Flavor: Some things should never be spoken. Some bridges can never be rebuilt. There is a wound on your heart that may never heal
Ability 1: $Exhaust Place 1 Opening or Break token in the Kratos Pool
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust If the Kratos Pool is empty, place up to 2 Opening and/or Break tokens in the Kratos Pool
Ability 3: %Danger 6+% $Fate $Exhaust If the Kratos Pool is empty, place up to 3 Opening and/or Break tokens in the Kratos Pool

Name: Imprisonment
Flavor: Who can tell how long it's been? Dark and damp, and cramped and lonely, the cell gave no quarters. Just a tiny crack in the wall
Ability 1: {Knockback Reduction 2}
Ability 2: {Pushback Reduction 1}
Ability 3: When you suffer Knockback, you may lose -1 @Danger

Name: Haunted
Flavor: You past lingers like a waft of cold air. Something happened to you. Something... unspeakable
Ability 1: Once per adventure, you may re-roll any d10 roll
Ability 2: $Fate When you are about to roll a d10 during an adventure, add +3 to this roll (once per adventure)
Ability 3: $Fate $Fate When you are about to perform an Argonaut Test during an adventure, automatically pass this test instead (once per adventure)

Name: A Broken Promise
Flavor: A word's no shield, it's easily broken. You probably had a reason, oathbreaker. They all do
Ability 1: When you are on a Rear space, you gain +1 Precision
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% When you are on a Rear space, you gain {Power Re-roll 1}
Ability 3: %Danger 6+% When you are on a Rear space, you gain {Auto-break 1}

Name: A Night To Remember
Flavor: Warm air and cold wine and fabulous colors on the night sky. A love realized or an age attained. A joyous celebration
Ability 1: $Exhaust Unexhaust a @Gear card
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust Another Titan may unexhaust a @Gear card
Ability 3: $Fate $Fate When you are about to exhaust a card, ignore this exhaust

Name: Death Follows
Flavor: Most people brush with death, but when he brushed with you, Tanatos paused. You have been trying to outrun him ever since
Ability 1: $Discard When you are about to perform a Power Roll, add 1 @RedPowerDie to your Power Pool
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Discard When you are about to perform a Power Roll, add 1 @BlackPowerDie to your Power Pool
Ability 3: %Danger 8+% $Discard When you are about to perform a Power Roll, add 2 @Power for this Roll

Name: Minoan Heritage
Flavor: Everywhere you look, familiarity. Your roots are buried under the Shattered Island. Or the Shattered Island is burying into you
Ability 1: $Exhaust During @MovementAction, gain +1 @Speed for this movement
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust During @MovementAction, gain +2 @Speed and {Bypass} for this movement
Ability 3: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust During @MovementAction, gain +3 @Speed and {Bypass} for this movement and gain {Vault} until the end of your turn

Name: Blood On Your Hands
Flavor: A look. A word. A misunderstanding and a mistake. You can't wash it off
Ability 1: After you raise you @Rage for any reason, if your @Rage is equal to current @PriorityTarget Priority Target's @Rage, you may gain the @PriorityTarget Priority Target token
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% If you are the @PriorityTarget Priority Target, you gain +1 Precision
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% If you are the @PriorityTarget Priority Target, you gain {Auto-break 1}

Name: A Familiar Curse
Flavor: Restless days in sweat and shade, sleepless nights under dim stars
Ability 1: %Danger 3+% $Fate $Exhaust Turn the Primordial in your direction
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust When another Titan is about to gain a Condition card or Condition token, gain it instead
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% $Fate $Danger $Exhaust While resolving an AI card, when the Primordial moves adjacent to you, become the Target of this AI card

Name: Curse Of The Gods
Flavor: Even in death their words have weight - and consequences
Ability 1: $Exhaust During an Attack Roll, re-roll all 1s on non-Crit dice
Ability 2: %Danger 6+% $Discard Re-roll an Awakening roll
Ability 3: $Fate $Discard WHen another Titan is about to gain @Danger, you gain it instead. If this @Danger was dealt by an Attack, resolve a Trauma Draw

Name: Runt Of The Litter
Flavor: You were the weakest of the lot. Were they mistaken?
Ability 1: $Exhaust Change 1 negative modifier token into a positive one
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust Gain 1 temporary positive @Evasion token
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% $Discard Gain or lose up to 2 @Rage

Name: MÃ©salliance
Flavor: Tyrannous customs branded you a bastard
Ability 1: When you break a Combo, place 1 Opening or Break token in the Kratos Pool
Ability 2: %Danger 2+% When you break a Combo, you may lose -1 @Fate
Ability 3: %Danger 6+% $Discard When you break a Combo, perform a Bonus Attack!

Name: Left For Dead
Flavor: They've all written you off, yet your story is still unwritten
Ability 1: $Discard When you survive an Obol, lose up to -3 @Danger and up to -2 @Fate
Ability 2: $Discard When you are about to die from an Instant Death effect, draw an Obol instead
Ability 3: If you are the last Titan alive, you cannot suffer Knockdown and your Titan's Power Die becomes @BlackPowerDie

Name: Spewed By The Abyss
Flavor: Even darkness did not want you
Ability 1: When you are about to gain at least 1 Ambrosia token, test (8+) for each of these tokens. For each success, lower Ambrosia gain by 1
Ability 2: $Discard Discard up to 2 Ambrosia tokens
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% $Discard When you are about to draw a Trauma card, gain Ambrosia tokens instead: 1 for Minor, 2 for Major, 3 for Grave, and 4 for an Obol

Name: Coward's Way
Flavor: You owe your cowardice your life. But what kind of life is it?
Ability 1: $Exhaust Before performing a Power Roll, gain @Fate equal to the BP level to immediately fail this Attack instead, ignoring the Fail Responses. If you do, do not place any tokens in the Kratos Pool
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Fate $Exhaust When you fail to Wound, place the BP card back on top of the BP deck instead of discarding it
Ability 3: %Danger 5+% $Discard When you are about to become the Target of an Attack, swap places with an adjacent Titan. That Titan becomes the Target instead

Name: Castoff
Flavor: Deemed not worthy, cast from the cliffs, you inexplicably survived
Ability 1: $Exhaust When you are about to resolve a Trauma Draw, treat your @Danger as 1 lower
Ability 2: When you are knocked down, unexhaust this card. When you stand up, gain +1 @Speed, +1 Precision and Auto-break 1 until the end of your turn
Ability 3: When you are about to die from a Trauma Draw, Obol Draw, or an Instant Death effect, you may perform a Bonus Attack! (You still die afterwards.)

Name: Death Precedes
Flavor: Death is your Harbinger
Ability 1: <Start of Battle> You may move 1 space towards the Primordial
Ability 2: <Start of Battle> You may gain +1 @Rage
Ability 3: <Start of Battle> Place 3 Opening tokens, 2 Break tokens, or 1 Rouse token in the Kratos Pool

Name: Forbidden Love
Flavor: You longed for the fobidden things, desired what was denied to you
Ability 1: $Exhaust {Daze}
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust {Inspire 1}
Ability 3: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust {Rouse 1}

Name: Scorned Champion
Flavor: When you reached the top you realized the only way forward was down
Ability 1: $Exhaust {Jump}
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% <Reaction> $Fate $Exhaust {Reflex}
Ability 3: %Danger 5+% $ComplicatedAction {Run}

Name: A Fall From Eden
Flavor: Your parent failed. Will you?
Ability 1: $Exhaust When you are about to suffer Knockdown, suffer Time-clocked instead
Ability 2: %Danger 7+% $Discard {Second Chance}
Ability 3: %Danger 9+% $Discard {Clutch}

Name: Unearned Life
Flavor: They were destined for great things. You should have died, not them
Ability 1: $Fate $Exhaust {Assist 1}
Ability 2: %Danger 7+% $Fate $Discard {Clutch}
Ability 3: $Discard {Succor}, then, immediately after current Attack ends, draw an Obol

Name: Life Of Regret
Flavor: Every decision you made was the wrong one. Now all you're left with is regret
Ability 1: $Exhaust Discard 1 Bleeding token
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust When you are about to suffer Bleeding X or gain Bleeding tokens, ignore that effect
Ability 3: %Danger 5+% $Discard When you are about to Discard a positive Trauma card due to the [Bleeding|CL1283] Condition card, return it to the top of the deck instead

Name: Time-Crossed Lovers
Flavor: Even time itself will not keep you apart
Ability 1: $Exhaust Reestablish your Time Anchor. You may use this ability as a free action or at the end of your turn
Ability 2: If your Time Anchor is adjacent to that of another Titan's, you have +1 Precision
Ability 3: %Danger 5+% $Discard When you are about to return to a Time Anchor, treat another Titan's Time Anchor as your own

Name: Timekeeper's Child
Flavor: Time and its passage is all you know. One day you will simply stop
Ability 1: $Exhaust Arrive from Time-clocked
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust Another Titan may arrive from Time-clocked
Ability 3: When you arrive from Time-clocked, gain +1 @Speed and {Auto-black 1} until the end of your turn

Name: Disgraceful Parent
Flavor: A lifetime of never being good enough
Ability 1: $Exhaust Place 1 Fire token in the Kratos Pool
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust If the Kratos Pool is empty, place 1 Fire token and 1 Black token in the Kratos Pool
Ability 3: %Danger 6+% $Fate $Exhaust If the Kratos Pool is empty, place 3 Hope tokens in the Kratos Pool

Name: Hero By Mistake
Flavor: This was not your responsibility. You did not ask for this
Ability 1: $Fate $Exhaust Gain the @PriorityTarget Priority Target token
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Fate If you are the Priority Target, gain {Rouse 1}
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% If you are the Priority Target, gain {Hope 1}

Name: The Returned
Flavor: You failed once. Now you need to go back and fix it
Ability 1: <Start of your turn> Reestablish your Time Anchor (even if the Backwards Momentum Trait is not in play). If you are on a Time Anchor, you have +1 Precision
Ability 2: $Fate $Exhaust {Rewind}
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% $Discard When you die, return from death to your Time Anchor

Name: Seed of Paradise
Flavor: The more you divide it, the more you have
Ability 1: %Danger 2+% $Exhaust When you attack, treat the Kratos Pool as Sunstarved or Sunbask 2 for the purposes of triggering abilities
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Fate $Exhaust During the Clear the Kratos Pool step, leave half of the unused tokens there
Ability 3: %Danger 3+% $Fate $Exhaust When you attack, move half of the tokens from the Kratos Pool to this card. During the Second Ability Window, move them to the Kratos Pool

Name: The Third Wish
Flavor: You saved the best for last
Ability 1: %Danger 1+% $Fate $Fate $Exhaust {Wish Armor}
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Fate $Fate {Wishrod}
Ability 3: %Danger 6+% $Discard Discard a [Wishkeen|DL2011] or [Wishagog|DL2011] Condition card and gained the [Enriched|DL2015] or [Lander|DL2019] Condition card

Name: The Beggar and the Prince
Flavor: A windfall or a sudden fall?
Ability 1: $Exhaust Discard 1 Midas token
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust When you are about to gain Midas tokens, ignore that gain
Ability 3: %Danger 9+% $Discard When you attack, discard all Midas tokens and gain that much Precision for this Attack

Name: Updraft
Flavor: Carries only those determined enough
Ability 1: $Exhaust {Hermes Move 1}
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% <Reaction> $Exhaust {Hermes Reflex}
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% $Discard {Hermes Move 3}

Name: Peddler of Misery
Flavor: When greed becomes the end in itself
Ability 1: %Danger 2+% $Exhaust {Startup 2}
Ability 2: %Danger 2+% $Fate $Exhaust Discard 1 Midas token and place 1 Black token in the Kratos Pool
Ability 3: %Danger 3+% $Discard {Unholy Alchemy}. Place X Closing tokens in the Kratos Pool, where X is the number of tokens turned

Name: Too Big to Fail
Flavor: They all said it
Ability 1: $Exhaust Deflate. You may use this ability while floating
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust When you are about to suffer Airburst during a Primordial Attack, ignore it
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% $Discard When a Curse Attack is about to affect you, ignore it (other Targets remain affected)

Name: The Thousandth Night
Flavor: You can stave off inevitability only for so long
Ability 1: %Danger 2+% $Exhaust Gain +X @Fate to gain +1 @Evasion, where X is the sum of Evasion bonuses you have (including this one)
Ability 2: %Danger 7+% $Discard {Second Chance}
Ability 3: %Danger 9+% $Discard When you are about to die, postpone the death until the end of your next turn. You cannot prevent that death in any way. <End of Battle> Gain a random Curse Affliction

Name: The Mule
Flavor: What grows in a barren wasteland?
Ability 1: $Exhaust Move an Irem Tower Terrain tile one space
Ability 2: %Danger 2+% $Discard Move an Irem Tower Terrain tile up to 3 spaces
Ability 3: %Danger 8+% $Discard Place an [Irem Tower|DI2028] Terrain tile anywhere on the Battle Board

Name: Vanishing Point
Flavor: It was meant to be
Ability 1: %Danger 2+% $Fate $Exhaust {Pull 1}
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Fate $Exhaust {Pushback 2}
Ability 3: %Danger 6+% $Fate $Discard {Pull 3} For the purposes of this Pull, ignore {Lumbering}

Name: In Your Image
Flavor: What else is there?
Ability 1: When you are about to gain at least 1 Pain token, test (8+) for each of these tokens. For each success, lower Pain gain by 1
Ability 2: $Discard Discard up to 2 Pain tokens
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% $Discard When you are about to draw a Trauma card, gain 5 Pain tokens instead

Name: Shelter
Flavor: How could you let it happen?
Ability 1: %Ambrosia 1+% $Fate $Exhaust When another Titan dies, immediately perform @MovementAction
Ability 2: %Ambrosia 2+% If you are adjacent to another Titan, you both ignore Burn
Ability 3: %Ambrosia 3+% If you are adjacent to another Titan, you both gain Tumble and automatically succeed at the Tumble test

Name: Dogma
Flavor: You were in the right
Ability 1: %Danger 2+% $Fate $Discard When you are about to suffer Burn, ignore that Burn
Ability 2: %Danger 5+% $Fate $Discard Ignore the effects of Despair tokens until the end of your turn
Ability 3: %Dagner 8+% $Fate $Discard Ignore Ambrosia tokens placed on your Gear with the Light X keyword until the end of this round

Name: Last Crusader
Flavor: There are monsters in this world
Ability 1: $Fate $Exhaust During a Light Check, gain Light 1
Ability 2: %Danger 5+% $Discard When you attack, ignore all negative Precision modifiers
Ability 3: %Danger 9+% $Fate $Discard {Block 1} or {Defy 1}

Name: Words and Deeds
Flavor: Do as I say
Ability 1: %Danger 2+% $Fate $Exhaust Take a [Fear|AL0299] or [Dread|AL0299] Condition card of an adjacent Titan and gain +1 @Rage
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Fate $Exhaust Take a [Terror|EL2596] or [Holy Terror|EL2596] Condition card of an adjacent Titan and gain 1 Aether token
Ability 3: %Danger 9+% $Discard Discard all Condition cards

Name: Twilight
Flavor: This is the end
Ability 1: %Danger 3+% $Fate $Discard Flip 1 Aether token
Ability 2: %Danger 7+% $Fate $Exhaust Ignore an Aether or Oxygen @Gear cost
Ability 3: %Danger 9+% $Oxygen $Fate $Discard When you are about to perform a Power Roll, add 1 @WhitePowerDie to your Power Pool

Name: He Spoke the Truth
Flavor: You have been chosen
Ability 1: %Despair 2+% $Fate $Discard {Dare}
Ability 2: %Despair 3+% $Aether $Discard {Deny}
Ability 3: %Despair 4+% $Oxygen $Fate $Discard You Titan's Power die becomes @MortalPowerDie for the duration of this Battle
